scripts.pub-get-all: cd libs/utils && pub get && cd ../typescript_reporter && cd ../../core && pub get && cd ../libs/typescript_generator && pub get && cd ../io_utils && pub get && cd ../../ai_server && pub get && cd ../editor_client && pub get && cd ../editor_server && pub get && cd ../game_client && pub get && cd ../game_server && pub get && cd ../hero_server && pub get && cd ../user_server && pub get
scripts.pub-upgrade-all: cd libs/utils && pub upgrade && cd ../typescript_reporter && cd ../../core && pub upgrade && cd ../libs/typescript_generator && pub upgrade && cd ../io_utils && pub upgrade && cd ../../ai_server && pub upgrade && cd ../editor_client && pub upgrade && cd ../editor_server && pub upgrade && cd ../game_client && pub upgrade && cd ../game_server && pub upgrade && cd ../hero_server && pub upgrade && cd ../user_server && pub upgrade
scripts.generate-core: cd core && pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs && prettier --write "**/*.ts"
